Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1501 MCKINNEY STREET, HOUSTON, Texas, 77010, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hess Midstream LP owns, operates, develops, and acquires a diverse set of midstream assets and provides fee-based services to Hess and third-party customers. It conducts its business through three operating segments: gathering, processing and storage and terminaling and export. The company derives the maximum revenue from the gathering segment. Its gathering segment consists of the following assets namely Natural Gas Gathering and Compression; Crude Oil Gathering and Produced Water Gathering and Disposal.
